info.name: Uni Hannover StudIP 2021 flowcasts video player
info.description:
Removes fixed size of flowcasts video player in studip (june 2021 update), so that the video is using the max width/height available in the browser or the video source width, whatever is smaller.

Additional modifications:
- the blubber integration below takes less space when no content is present.
- the video settings menu looks nicer now
